data: I was not yet Forty years of age, Hale and Stout, Comely enough,—so said Mistress Prue and many other damsels,—with a Military Education, an approved reputation for Valour, and very little else besides.

The Strange Adventures of Captain Dangerous, Vol. 3 
Who was a sailor, a soldier, a merchant, a spy, a slave
among the moors...
